alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 3:34AM AKST until January 27 at 7:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM AKST FRIDAY FROM DILLINGHAM NORTH AND WEST... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Bristol Bay, Dillingham north and west. * WHEN...From noon to 7 PM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Warmer air moves into Bristol Bay on Friday. Snow will transition to freezing rain during the afternoon hours on Friday, becoming all rain by Friday evening. Freezing rain may persist further inland near Koliganek into the evening hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
